segments.text: I'm really worried about that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, reaching for that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just know it's going to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hit his head on the counter or the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing so close, she might get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with the floor already wet from the overflowing sink, a fall would be even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stabilize that stool or tell him to get down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such an obvious hazard ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is completely oblivious to this dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just ripe for an accident to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and stop him from climbing further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tension in the air is palpable, waiting for the inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR
